According to the document, this is a 12-month full-time appointment. Salary will be commensurate with qualifications.

There is no clear indication that employment for this position will be limited to a specific duration of less than a year. However, it is worth noting that the job posting does mention that the position is a "12-month full-time appointment" and that the salary will be "commensurate with qualifications." This suggests that the employer may be seeking an individual who is willing to commit to a longer-term employment arrangement.
